mapper.sql: ROLE_ID, ROLE, ROLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_USER, CREATED, UPDATE_USER, UPDATED, LOCKED
mapper.select: SELECT mr.ROLE_ID , mr.ROLE , mr.ROLE_NAME , mr.DESCRIPTION , mr.CREATE_USER , mr.CREATED , mr.UPDATE_USER , mr.UPDATED , mr.LOCKED FROM R_USER_ROLES rur LEFT JOIN M_ROLE mr ON rur.ROLE_ID=mr.ROLE_ID WHERE rur.USER_ID=#{userId} AND rur.locked=0 AND mr.locked=0
